short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Track time for multiple projects or activities.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple time tracking extension to help you track your time spent in projects and activities.  This simple extension has no ads, no tracking, no cost, and no fluff.  It's a simple passion project.  Enjoy.
